fixed_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 127.9/134.3/140.7%  of Attack. Increase critical rate by 30%, and decrease accuracy by 20%.
fixed_skill.name: Miracle Punch

innate_skill.desc: Decrease this skill's accuracy by 15%, increase critical rate by 16%, and deal Gun damage to all foes equal to 14.9/15.6/16.4% of Attack (3 hits).
innate_skill.name: Triple Down

innate_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to all foes equal to 40.8/42.8/44.9% of Attack. 2.6/2.7/2.9% chance to inflict Fear for 3 turns.
innate_skill.name: Bloodbath

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 10.6%. When a critical attack knocks down a foe, increase user's Attack by 30% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Let's Play!

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 10.6%. When a critical attack knocks down a foe, increase user's Attack by 35% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Let's Play! I

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 10.6%. When a critical attack knocks down a foe, increase user's Attack by 40% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Let's Play! II

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Gun damage to 1 foe equal to 360.0%/385.2%/410.4% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
